From Nathon: Head 5 km north, then take a left just before the road rises steeply and turns east.
From Chaweng: Head west approximately 12 km along the northern ring road, take a right turn at the bottom of the hill when the road angles to the left.

Taxi from Chaweng: 600 baht. Recommend your own transport. Hire a motorbike or a 4 x 4.
Beautiful sunsets, shallow seas, and idyllic coconut palm-lined beaches await explorers.
Walk along the beach, take a kayak out on the ocean, chill.
